FuncDef: The display traffic-analysis tcp cache command displays detailed information about intelligent traffic analysis results for TCP flows. The display traffic-analysis tcp cache command displays detailed information about intelligent traffic analysis results for TCP flows. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
CLIs: display traffic-analysis tcp ipv4 cache [ [ clientip <cip> | clientvni <cvniid> | clientport <cport> | { clientinterface <cifname> | clientinterface <ciftype> <interface-number> } | serverip <sip> | servervni <svniid> | serverport <sport> | { serverinterface <sifname> | serverinterface <siftype> <interface-number> } ] ] slot <slot-id>

display traffic-analysis tcp ipv6 cache [ [ clientipv6 <cip-v6-address> | clientvni <cvniid> | clientport <cport> | { clientinterface <cifname> | clientinterface <ciftype> <interface-number> } | serveripv6 <sip-v6-address> | servervni <svniid> | serverport <sport> | { serverinterface <sifname> | serverinterface <siftype> <interface-number> } ] ] slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a client.
-

Specifies the IP address of a client.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the IP address of a server.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a VXLAN Network Identifier (VNI).
-

Specifies the VNI of a client.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 16777215.

Specifies the interface number.
-

Specifies the port number of a client.
The value is an integer. The value ranges from 0 to 65535.

Specifies an interface.
-

Specifies the interface name on a client.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the interface type on a client.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the interface index.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a server.
-

Specifies the VNI of a server.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 16777215.

Specifies the port number of a server.
The value is an integer. The value ranges from 0 to 65535.

Specifies the interface name on a server.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the interface type on a server.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a slot ID.
-

Specifies the ID of a device.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

Specify traffic analysis client IPv6.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specify traffic analysis server IPv6.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Displays the IPv6 flow table.
-

Displays the IPv4 flow table.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display traffic-analysis tcp  ipv4 cache slot 1
